isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - POWER TAKE OFF: ROCKWELL REAR ENGINE MOUNTED - CLEAN AND INSPECT - CLEANING THE GROUND OR POLISHED PARTS

svcproc.title: CLEANING THE GROUND OR POLISHED PARTS

warning.para: If you use cleaning solvents, hot solution tanks or alkaline solutions incorrectly, injury can occur. To prevent injury, follow the instructions supplied by the manufacturer. Do NOT use gasoline to clean parts. Gasoline can explode.

svcproc.para: Use a cleaning solvent to clean ground or polished parts and surfaces. Kerosene or diesel fuel can be used for this purpose. DO NOT USE GASOLINE.
Do NOT clean ground or polished parts in a hot solution tank or with water, steam or alkaline solutions. These solutions will cause corrosion of the parts.
